neighbors.name: George Shamblin
neighbors.claims: George Shamblin is identified as the owner of parcel 12.-1-58 on Lockport Road in Genesee County ([dps.ny.gov](https://documents.dps.ny.gov/public/Common/ViewDoc.aspx?DocRefId={C04B4D91-0000-C847-993C-A63F1E4E967C}&DocTitle=AttC_CSF_ALTAIndex)). Public records suggest the George Shamblin associated with this property may be deceased or the property is held by his estate, as obituaries note a George Shamblin of Oakfield passed away prior to 2025 ([bataviafuneralhomes.com](https://www.bataviafuneralhomes.com/obituaries/lorene-shamblin)). The property is directly involved in the Cider Solar Farm project, with land survey documents listing a "Proposed Easement" on the parcel ([dps.ny.gov](https://documents.dps.ny.gov/public/Common/ViewDoc.aspx?DocRefId={C04B4D91-0000-C847-993C-A63F1E4E967C}&DocTitle=AttC_CSF_ALTAIndex)).
neighbors.influence_justification: No current public roles found; likely estate ownership

approach_recommendations.engage: Coordinate with the estate executor or heirs regarding the existing proposed easement status, ensuring terms are clear for the successors.

citations.claim: George Shamblin is identified as the owner of parcel 12.-1-58 on Lockport Road
citations.title: Cider Solar Farm ALTA Index

citations.claim: George Shamblin passed away prior to 2025
citations.title: Obituary of Lorene May Shamblin

citations.claim: Land survey documents list a Proposed Easement on the parcel
citations.title: Cider Solar Farm ALTA Survey Index

neighbors.name: Anne Bezon
neighbors.claims: Anne M. Bezon serves as the Coordinator for the Justice for Children Advocacy Center in Genesee County ([nysenate.gov](https://www.nysenate.gov/sites/default/files/articles/attachments/NYS%20Childrens%20Alliance.pdf)). She is the registered owner of parcel 16.-1-29.12 on Lockport Road, which is classified as residential property ([geneseeny.gov](https://www.geneseeny.gov/files/sharedassets/county/v/1/treasurer/assessment-rolls/elba-2025-tentative-roll.pdf)). The Bezon family is associated with 'Joseph Bezon & Sons', a prominent agricultural entity in the region that receives agricultural subsidies ([farm.ewg.org](https://farm.ewg.org/top_recips.php?fips=36037&progcode=total&page=6)).
neighbors.influence_justification: County Coordinator role and prominent farm family ties

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via trusted agricultural community members, acknowledging her family's farming history and her public service role in the county.

citations.claim: Serves as Coordinator for the Justice for Children Advocacy Center
citations.title: NYS Children's Alliance Member List

citations.claim: Owner of parcel 16.-1-29.12 on Lockport Road
citations.title: Town of Elba 2025 Tentative Assessment Roll

citations.claim: Joseph Bezon & Sons is a prominent agricultural entity receiving subsidies
citations.title: EWG Farm Subsidy Database - Genesee County

neighbors.name: Brian Pritchett
neighbors.claims: Brian Pritchett is the owner of parcel 16.-1-6 in Genesee County ([geneseeny.gov](https://www.geneseeny.gov/files/content/county/v/12/department-content/planning/agricultural-and-farmland-protection/2025-03-18-meeting-packet.pdf)). He has demonstrated support for renewable energy development by executing a Right-of-Way (ROW) Easement with the Cider Solar Farm project in July 2023 ([dps.ny.gov](https://documents.dps.ny.gov/public/Common/ViewDoc.aspx?DocRefId={C04B4D91-0000-C72D-923C-C58FC173D7D1})). His property is also enrolled in an agricultural district review ([geneseeny.gov](https://www.geneseeny.gov/files/content/county/v/12/department-content/planning/agricultural-and-farmland-protection/2025-03-18-meeting-packet.pdf)).
neighbors.influence_justification: No known public office; influence limited to property rights

approach_recommendations.engage: Maintain relationship as a participating landowner; ensure he is satisfied with the easement process to serve as a positive reference.

citations.claim: Owner of parcel 16.-1-6 in Genesee County
citations.title: Genesee County Agricultural and Farmland Protection Board Meeting Packet

citations.claim: Executed a Right-of-Way (ROW) Easement with Cider Solar Farm in July 2023
citations.title: Cider Solar Farm Status of Land Interests
